welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Schermbeck, a charming city known for its historic buildings and picturesque countryside. We hope you enjoy your stay and explore all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Essen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Essen Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal building at Moenchen-gl. - Dus Exp Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights at Moenchen-gl. - Dus Exp Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access.
